moves.name: Dire Hit +
moves.effect: Sharply raises the user’s critical-hit rate.

moves.name: Fly
moves.effect: The user begins flying. After a set time, the user stops flying and attacks. No other actions can be taken while flying. Most moves used by opponents will not hit the user while it is flying. If the user is hit by a sync move while flying, it will stop flying.

moves.name: Be Brave!
moves.effect: Drastically raises the user’s Attack. Raises the user’s accuracy.

passives.name: Power Flux 3
passives.description: The fuller the move gauge, the more this powers up moves.

passives.name: Quick Combo 3
passives.description: Has a moderately good chance of refreshing the number of times the user can use its quick moves by one when an attack is successful.
